content.title: Standard Button and Rounded Buttons
content.code: <button class='bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded focus:outline-none focus:ring active:text-white'>Standard Button</button><button class='bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-full focus:outline-none focus:ring active:text-white'>Rounded Button</button>

content.title: Standard Button and Rounded Button with Basic hover effect
content.code: <button class='bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded focus:outline-none focus:ring active:text-blue-500 hover:bg-white hover:text-blue-500'>Standard Button</button><button class='bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-full focus:outline-none focus:ring active:text-blue-500 hover:bg-white hover:text-blue-500'>Rounded Button</button>

content.title: Standard Button and Rounded Button with Basic hover effect + Icon
content.code: <button class='bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded focus:outline-none focus:ring active:text-blue-500 hover:bg-white hover:text-blue-500'><svg class='w-4 h-4 inline-block mb-1 mr-1' aria-hidden='true' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' fill='currentColor' viewBox='0 0 24 24'><path fill-rule='evenodd' d='M8.6 5.2A1 1 0 0 0 7 6v12a1 1 0 0 0 1.6.8l8-6a1 1 0 0 0 0-1.6l-8-6Z' clip-rule='evenodd'/></svg>Play Button</button><button class='bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-full focus:outline-none focus:ring active:text-blue-500 hover:bg-white hover:text-blue-500'><svg class='w-4 h-4 inline-block mb-1 mr-1' aria-hidden='true' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' fill='currentColor' viewBox='0 0 24 24'><path d='M7 5a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v10a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h10a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V7a2 2 0 0 0-2-2H7Z'/></svg>Stop Button</button>

content.title: Icon only with hover effect
content.code: <button class='bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded focus:outline-none focus:ring active:text-blue-500 hover:bg-white hover:text-blue-500'><svg class='w-4 h-4 inline-block' aria-hidden='true' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' fill='currentColor' viewBox='0 0 24 24'><path fill-rule='evenodd' d='M8.6 5.2A1 1 0 0 0 7 6v12a1 1 0 0 0 1.6.8l8-6a1 1 0 0 0 0-1.6l-8-6Z' clip-rule='evenodd'/></svg></button><button class='bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded focus:outline-none focus:ring active:text-blue-500 hover:bg-white hover:text-blue-500'><svg class='w-4 h-4 inline-block' aria-hidden='true' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' fill='currentColor' viewBox='0 0 24 24'><path d='M7 5a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v10a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h10a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V7a2 2 0 0 0-2-2H7Z'/></svg></button>

content.title: Standard Button and Rounded Button with basic hover effect + Icon + Icon Animation on hover
content.code: <button class='group bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded focus:outline-none focus:ring active:text-blue-500 hover:bg-white hover:text-blue-500'><svg class='w-4 h-4 inline-block mb-1 mr-1 transform transition-all duration-1000 group-hover:rotate-360' aria-hidden='true' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' fill='currentColor' viewBox='0 0 24 24'><path fill-rule='evenodd' d='M8.6 5.2A1 1 0 0 0 7 6v12a1 1 0 0 0 1.6.8l8-6a1 1 0 0 0 0-1.6l-8-6Z' clip-rule='evenodd'/></svg>Play Button</button><button class='group bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-full focus:outline-none focus:ring active:text-blue-500 hover:bg-white hover:text-blue-500'><svg class='w-4 h-4 inline-block mb-1 mr-1 transform transition-all duration-1000 group-hover:rotate-360' aria-hidden='true' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' fill='currentColor' viewBox='0 0 24 24'><path d='M7 5a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v10a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h10a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V7a2 2 0 0 0-2-2H7Z'/></svg>Stop Button</button>

content.title: Standard Button and Rounded Buttons with expanding hover effect
content.code: <button class='bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded focus:outline-none focus:ring active:text-white transition hover:scale-110'>Standard Button</button><button class='bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-full focus:outline-none focus:ring active:text-white transition hover:scale-110'>Rounded Button</button>
